front.title: Extensions to the Path Computation Element Communication Protocol for Traffic Engineering Label Switched Paths in SDH Networks

abstract.t: [GMPLS-REQ] describes functional requirements for Generalized Multi- Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) application of Path Computation Element (PCE). This document explains the application-specific extensions for the Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) to support SDH. PCEP is the communication protocol defined by IETF in RFC5440. zhang Expires July 2010 [page 1] draft-zhang-pce-pcep-extensions-for-sdh-00.txt January 2010 Conventions used in this document The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
